Characters
View On FortressMaximus.io

Autobot Hotrod - Impulsive Fighter

  1. Say I have Autobot Hot Rod (Sentinel) in the KO area and Cliffjumper in play in alt mode. When I flip Hot Rod in the KO area to bot mode, does it trigger Cliffjumper’s ability to draw a card? Since Cliffjumper’s ability doesn’t stipulate the Car has to be in play, it would seem like this would be valid, right?
    No. Card abilities do not affect and are not affected by cards in the KO area unless specifically stated on the card.
